description: This Dart script serves as an entry point to dispatch analysis by invoking an external shell script ('analyze.sh') within a specified application directory. It performs checks for the existence of the app directory and script, and executes the script with appropriate permissions and working directory.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Asynchronously dispatches app analysis by invoking an external shell script within a specified directory, handling errors if the directory or script is missing, and ensuring script executability on Unix-like systems.
